sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import ifollowers from '../../assets/icon-visability-shared.png' import ifollowing from '../../assets/icon-visability-provate.png' import {rounding} from "../../utils/rounding"; import {Preloader} from "../Preloader/Preloader"; import './Profile.css' export const Profile = () => { const state = useSelector(state => state.user) const {avatar_url, login, name, followers, following, html_url} = state.user return (
{name}
{login}
{rounding(followers)} followers
{following} following
) }
